history.content:
There is a student run club called Blockchain at Berkeley. I believe they run a decal (although I'm not sure).

Also I would highly suggest classes on mainly cryptography (CS171 I believe, there are graduate classes too) and to a lesser extent computer security (CS161, graduate classes here too) as you'll learn the intuition behind ideas of proofs of security which are critical to understanding blockchain technologies.

There is a student run club called Blockchain at Berkeley. I believe they run a decal (although I'm not sure).

children.subject: 171 is not being offered in the fall ? :(

history.content: Are there any distributed ledger technology  courses at Cal? If not, Is anyone interested in creating a decal ? Blockchain technology underpins cryptocurreny, but I am interested in exploring it's applications across other sectors. Does anyone know of a professor at Cal that I can contact to discuss this further with ?
history.subject: Blockchain Technology Courses?
